title: BRIEF-Clp Holdings Declares Third Interim Dividend For 2019 Of HK$0.63 Per Share
text:
BRIEF-Clp Holdings Declares Third Interim Dividend For 2019 Of HK$0.63 Per Share

Stock Markets 11 minutes ago (Oct 21, 2019 19:42)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Clp Holdings Declares Third Interim Dividend For 2019 Of HK$0.63 Per Share Oct 21 (Reuters) - CLP Holdings Ltd : * DECLARED THIRD INTERIM DIVIDEND FOR 2019 OF HK$0.63 PER SHARE * QTRLY TOTAL ELECTRICITY SALES, WHICH INCLUDED HONG KONG SALES AND SALES TO MAINLAND CHINA, DECREASED 0.3% * RETAIL COMPETITION REMAINS INTENSE, PARTICULARLY IN VICTORIA * ENERGYAUSTRALIA HAS ALSO BEEN WORKING CLOSELY WITH STATE GOVERNMENT & MINE OWNER CENTENNIAL TO FIND ALTERNATIVE SOURCES OF COAL * CLP INDIA'S NEW 250MW WIND ENERGY PROJECT IS EXPECTED TO GO INTO OPERATION IN 2021 * IN AUSTRALIA, CONTINUATION OF HIGH & VOLATILE WHOLESALE PRICES RAISED COSTS OF PROCURING ENERGY, ESPECIALLY DURING HIGH CUSTOMER DEMAND PERIOD * CONTINUATION OF HIGH AND VOLATILE WHOLESALE PRICES EXPECTED TO IMPACT SUPPLY COST FOR FUTURE PERIODS IN AUSTRALIA

BRIEF-Clp Holdings Declares Third Interim Dividend For 2019 Of HK$0.63 Per Share
description: BRIEF-Clp Holdings Declares Third Interim Dividend For 2019 Of HK$0.63 Per Share
